posts.post_content:
Posted By: nbrazil
sold

Unfortunately, the slab for the card is cracked due to bad shipping and handling. I guarantee that the card was not damaged. I was going to break it out of the slab and reholder it (or keep it raw), but I recently bought an upgrade.

The price above includes S&H. Emails take priority over posts. If you would like insurance, I will need to factor it in the price. If you would like to hold the card, you will need to explicitly say so. Otherwise, the card goes to the first taker.
